data.route_analysis: Major routes connecting popular sites include Antigua to Lake Atitlán and Tikal; public buses and private shuttles are common means of transport.
data.seasonal_patterns: High season runs from December to February; autumn (September to November) is less crowded but still offers pleasant weather.
data.climate: In autumn, expect mild temperatures, with an average of 20-25°C (68-77°F), with occasional rain showers; light jackets suggested in the evenings.
data.culture: Celebrations such as the Day of the Dead in early November highlight local traditions, along with markets showcasing textiles and handicrafts.
data.attractions: Key attractions include the colonial city of Antigua, the scenic Lake Atitlán surrounded by volcanoes, and the ancient Mayan ruins of Tikal.
